name: Find Your Rhythm
description:
Find Your Rhythm is a fast and funky 2D platformer in which you control Alex, a teenage girl trying to find her lost CDs in the tough, semi-futuristic metropolis of Grime City. In each level, you'll run, jump, and wall-jump through dangerous obstacles in order to get to Alex's precious CD.

Key elements:

  • Classic 2D precision platforming
  • Straightforward, linear gameplay
  • Stylish, hand-drawn graphics
  • Short but sweet playtime - beatable in half an hour

Credits:

  • Art assets, game concepts, and level design by Ethan Godwin
  • Code for game mechanics by Michael Baker
  • "Fresh Marker" font by John Gauthier
